name: @elumixor/asset-viewer
description: A simple asset viewer for PixiJS and Three.js

scripts.build: bun run build:clean && bun run build:bundle && bun run build:shebang
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m "Release v%s" && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m "Release v%s" && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m "Release v%s" && git push --tags
